Use the keyboard shortcut: Windows + Shift + S (Windows 10 only) If you use Windows 10, press Windows + Shift + S to capture a region of your screen and copy it to your clipboard. After you press Windows + Shift + S, the screen is dimmed, and a cursor is shown, that you can use to draw on the screen the region that you want to capture in a screenshot. Press the left-click mouse button, draw the area that you want to capture and release the mouse button. If you have a touchscreen, draw the area that you want to capture with your finger (or pen) on the screen.The screenshot is saved to the clipboard. The popularity of the Screenshot is growing up for its features.The screenshot is the easiest way to show your own thing of your device to others as an image. In this article, I am going to teach you how you take a screenshot on your laptop, computer or smartphone easily. TAKE SCREENSHOT ON PC : STEP 1 : The simplest way to take a screenshot is using Shortcut Key. For this process, Press Windows Button + Print Screen Button. The screenshot will be saved automatically after the process in your computer system. Go to My Computer.Open Picture ⇒ Screenshot.You will get those screenshot by using this process. It is the best option to take a screenshot on your computer or laptop. STEP 2 : The second option is the Snipping tool. If you use Windows 7 or Windows 8 or Windows 10 in your computer system then you will get an inbuilt software names Snipping Tool in the system.Open Snipping Tool. Click Open ⇒ New and select the portion of your screen in which you want to take the screenshot.Then Save the screenshot in your perfect place.You can easily take a screenshot of this inbuilt software of your computer system. STEP 3 : The third option is to use the PrtSc button. When you click the Prtsc button on the keyboard then your computer system copies the screen automatically. Click on the PrntScr button.Open Paint and press Ctrl + V or Paste.Save the picture as a screenshot.So, you can easily take a screenshot of your computer system. Now I am going to talk about the screenshot on mobile.If you have a smartphone with Ice Cream Sandwich or above version, screenshots are built right into it. Just press the Volume Down and Power buttons at the same time, hold them for a second, and your smartphone will take a screenshot. It’ll show up in your Gallery.
